item.title: Free software for conversation design
item.description: In the ever-evolving landscape of conversational AI and its applications, it’s crucial to understand the various tools available to craft compelling conversational experiences. If you’re new in this field and want to design your first conversations, you might want to try some of the most popular conversation design software. In this blog post, I review Voiceflow and Landbot, which are widely used and which offer free plans for beginners. Voiceflow Voiceflow is a software used both for prototyping and for designing conversations.
